title: Make more actions available on text selection
description: I could not find the action 'Add Javadoc Comment' until I switched to the Outline view. Currently, the actions seem to be distributed based on personal preference. This should be changed so that all actions are easily accessible from the editor. It is not clear to users why some actions are in the context menu and some are not. It is not acceptable to force users to switch views to access certain actions.
OB: The action 'Add Javadoc Comment' is not available in the context menu.
